participant_1.background:
I like to eat at the local diner when I'm studying for my master's degree.
i want to be an explorer.
I am a professional bowler who overcame a broken arm to achieve my dream.
Last year, I found inspiration in the world and used it to help my clients with their taxes.
I spend my free time tinkering with new cellphone app ideas.

participant_2.background:
After I quit my job, I returned the 2 monitors to my boss.
I'm going to work on a new piece for my portfolio.
I'm looking forward to a relaxing weekend at home with my dog, playing games and watching movies.
connor mcgreggor is my favorite fighter.
i love to tell jokes.

content.text: What's up? I'm thinking about going to the diner today.
Sounds good! I just quit my job and returned the 2 monitors to my boss.
Oh wow, what did you do there?
I was a tax accountant but I just wasn't passionate about it anymore.
Oh man, I hear that. I wanted to be an explorer for a while but I broke my arm and had to give up on it.
That's too bad, I bet you would have been great at it!
Thanks! I'm trying to find a new dream now, maybe I'll become a professional bowler.
That would be cool! Do you bowl a lot?
Yeah, I've been bowling since I was a kid. I'm pretty good at it too.
Well, good luck with your new dream! I'm sure you'll be great at it.
Thanks! I appreciate that. What are you doing this weekend?
I'm going to work on a new piece for my portfolio and then relax with my dog.
That sounds like a good plan. I'm going to do the same thing! We should get together sometime and bowl.
That would be fun! I'm free next weekend.
Great! I'll message you and we can figure out a time.
